workflow.name: Generate AI incident reports with GPT-4, Slack alerts, Gmail and PDF export
workflow.description:
# **AI-Powered Incident Report Generator with Severity Alerts & PDF Delivery**

---

## **Description**

Automate incident reporting from detection to delivery with AI-driven analysis and professional documentation.

This workflow transforms raw incident details into a **clear, structured incident report**, performs **AI-based root cause and impact analysis**, triggers **real-time alerts for high-severity issues**, and delivers a **polished PDF report** to your operations team ‚Äî all with minimal manual effort.

---

## **What This Workflow Does**

Turns incident reporting into a fast, reliable, and repeatable process:

üö® **Receive Incident Details** ‚Äì Accepts incident data via webhook (ID, severity, systems affected, description).

üß† **AI Analysis** ‚Äì Uses AI to generate root cause analysis, impact assessment, and recommended actions.

‚ö†Ô∏è **Severity Check** ‚Äì Automatically detects high-severity incidents.

üí¨ **Slack Alerts** ‚Äì Sends instant alerts for critical incidents to the ops channel.

üìÑ **Professional Report Generation** ‚Äì Formats incident details into a clean, readable report.

üìë **PDF Creation** ‚Äì Converts the report into a downloadable PDF.

üìß **Email Delivery** ‚Äì Sends the report to the operations team.

‚òÅÔ∏è **Secure Storage** ‚Äì Saves a copy to Google Drive for records and compliance.

---

## **Key Features**

ü§ñ **AI-Generated Analysis** ‚Äì Automated root cause, impact, and action recommendations
‚ö° **Real-Time Severity Alerts** ‚Äì Immediate Slack notifications for high-risk incidents
üìÑ **Professional PDF Reports** ‚Äì Clean, structured, and ready for audits
üìß **Automated Delivery** ‚Äì Email reports without manual follow-ups
‚òÅÔ∏è **Centralized Storage** ‚Äì Securely archive reports in Google Drive

---

## **Perfect For**

üè¢ IT & Operations Teams
üîê Security & Compliance Teams
üßë‚Äçüíº Internal Ops & Risk Management
üè≠ Enterprises handling system or process incidents
üìä Teams needing audit-ready incident documentation

---

## **What You‚Äôll Need**

### Required Integrations

ü§ñ **OpenAI** ‚Äì Incident analysis and recommendations
üìÑ **HTMLCSS to PDF** ‚Äì Convert reports into PDFs
üìß **Gmail** ‚Äì Send incident reports
üí¨ **Slack** ‚Äì Severity-based alerts

### Optional

‚òÅÔ∏è **Google Drive** ‚Äì Store incident reports securely

---

## **Quick Start**

1Ô∏è‚É£ Import the workflow into n8n
2Ô∏è‚É£ Connect OpenAI, Slack, Gmail, and HTMLCSS to PDF credentials
3Ô∏è‚É£ Update Slack channel and email recipients
4Ô∏è‚É£ Trigger the webhook with incident data
5Ô∏è‚É£ Activate the workflow

---

## **Expected Results**

‚ö° Faster incident response
ü§ñ Consistent AI-driven analysis
üìâ Reduced manual reporting work
üìÑ Audit-ready incident documentation
üö® Immediate visibility into critical incidents

values.content:
=You are an expert incident analyst. Analyze the following incident and provide:
1. Root Cause Analysis (likely causes)
2. Impact Assessment (business and technical impact)
3. Recommended Actions (immediate and long-term)

Format your response as JSON with these exact keys:
{
  "root_cause": "detailed analysis",
  "impact_assessment": "business and technical impact",
  "immediate_actions": ["action 1", "action 2"],
  "long_term_actions": ["action 1", "action 2"]
}

parameters.subject: =[{{ $('Data Recovery').item.json.severity.toUpperCase() }}] Incident Report: {{ $('Data Recovery').item.json.title }} - {{$('Data Recovery').item.json.incident_id }}

parameters.content:
### How It Works
This workflow automates incident report generation and crisis response management for operations teams. When an incident is reported via webhook, the system normalizes and validates the incoming data including incident ID, title, description, severity level, affected systems, and initial impact assessment. The structured data is sent to OpenAI GPT-4 for intelligent analysis, which performs root cause analysis, assesses business and technical impact, and generates actionable recommendations split into immediate and long-term actions. The AI response is parsed and merged with the original incident details to create a comprehensive report dataset. For high-severity incidents, the workflow automatically triggers a Slack alert to notify the operations team immediately with critical details and preliminary recommendations. All incidents proceed to document generation where a beautifully formatted HTML report is created with severity badges, color-coded risk indicators, structured sections, and actionable items. This HTML is converted to a professional PDF that's simultaneously emailed to the operations team with an executive summary and uploaded to Google Drive for permanent record-keeping and compliance documentation.

### Setup Steps
1. Connect required credentials: OpenAI API, HTML-to-PDF service, Gmail, Google Drive, and Slack.
2. Configure the Slack channel where high-severity incident alerts should be posted.
3. Update the email recipient address in the "Send Email" node (currently ops-team@yourcompany.com).
4. Customize the Google Drive folder where incident reports should be stored.
5. Adjust the severity threshold in the "Check Severity" node if you want alerts for medium-severity incidents too.
6. Copy the webhook URL and integrate it into your monitoring system or incident reporting tool.
7. Test with sample incidents of varying severity levels to verify routing and notifications.

### Customization
- Modify the AI system prompt to include industry-specific analysis frameworks or compliance requirements.
- Adjust the severity color scheme and badges in the HTML template to match your brand guidelines.
- Add additional notification channels (PagerDuty, Microsoft Teams) for critical incidents.
- Customize the email template styling and branding to align with your organization's visual identity.
- Expand the AI analysis to include cost impact calculations or SLA breach assessments.

## Input & Data Normalization
Receives incident details via webhook and structures data for AI analysis.

## AI Analysis & Risk Assessment
Uses OpenAI to analyze root cause, assess impact, and generate actionable recommendations.

## Severity Routing & Alerts
Routes high-severity incidents to immediate Slack notifications, others proceed to reporting.

## Report Generation & Distribution
Creates formatted PDF report and delivers via email and Google Drive storage.

user.name: Jitesh Dugar
user.bio: AI Automation Specialist - OpenAI, CRM & Automation Expert with a solid understanding of various tools that include Zapier, Make, Zoho CRM, Hubspot, Google Sheets, Airtable, Pipedrive, Google Analytics, and more.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
